errors.payment_number_with_cash: The cash payment can be executed only once.
errors.payment_number_with_tokenize: The payment at delivery can be executed only once.
errors.not_payment_number_with_xtime: The installment payment must consist of several installments.
errors.not_payment_number_with_recurring: The subscription payment must consist of several installments.
errors.payment_report_with_cash: The cash payment can not be shifted.
errors.payment_report_with_tokenize: The payment at the delivery can not be shifted.
errors.payment_report_with_xtime: The installment payment can not be shifted.
errors.first_payment_part_range: The first payment part must be an number between 1 and 99.
errors.first_payment_part_without_xtime: First payment part option is only available for installment payment.
errors.order_repeated_without_recurring: The repeated order option is only available for subscription payment.
errors.title_min_length: The wording of the payment button must not be empty.
errors.title_max_length: The wording of the payment button must not be longer than 100 characters.
errors.image_height_positive: The height of the image must be a positive integer.
errors.min_amount_positive: The minimum amount of the cart must be a positive integer.
errors.max_amount_positive: The maximum amount of the cart must be a positive integer.
errors.position_positive: The position of the payment button must be a positive integer.
errors.unavailable_payment_mode: The selected payment mode is not enabled for your store.
errors.unavailable_payment_type: The selected payment method is not enabled for your store.

order_repeated.helper: At each due payment, the previous order is recreated automatically.
